greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Expansion of Product_{k>=1} (1+x^(3*k-2))^k.
link: Vaclav Kotesovec, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..10000
Vaclav Kotesovec, A method of finding the asymptotics of q-series based on the convolution of generating functions, arXiv:1509.08708 [math.CO], Sep 30 2015
mathematica: Clear[a]; a[n_]:=a[n] = If[n==0, 1, Sum[Sum[d*{0, 2*Floor[d/6] + 1, -Floor[d/6] - 1, 0, 2*Floor[d/6] + 2, 0}[[1 + Mod[d, 6]]], {d, Divisors[j]}] * a[n-j], {j, 1, n}]/n]; Table[a[n], {n, 0, 100}]
results.author: _Vaclav Kotesovec_, Oct 04 2015
